history.proof: intros H1 H2. unfold dom. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros w this s1 s2 l H1 H2.
apply (step_preserves_labels s1 s2 H2) in H4.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
w: world
this: nid
s1: UMC.sort (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)
s2: state
l: Equality.sort Label

Goal:
l \in dom s1 -> network_step s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (gets s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (gets s2 l))

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Notation gets := getStatelet
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
Inductive network_step (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), st \In get_st l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag :=
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
nid = nat : Set
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
union_mapUMC : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V
step_is_local : forall (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (gets s1 l)) = find z (dstate (gets s2 l))
step_preserves_labels : forall s1 s2 : state, network_step s1 s2 -> dom s1 =i dom s2
Coh_dom : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (gets s l)) =i nodes (getp l) (gets s l)
SendMsg : forall (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), st \In get_st l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step s1 s2
ReceiveMsg : forall (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), rt \In get_rt l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (gets s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step s1 s2
network_step_sind : forall (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), st \In get_st l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), st \In get_st l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
stepV1 : forall s1 s2 : state, network_step s1 s2 -> valid s1
Idle : forall s1 s2 : state, s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step s1 s2
stepV2 : forall s1 s2 : state, network_step s1 s2 -> valid s2
step_coh : forall s1 s2 : state, network_step s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
disj_false : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V) (x : K), x \in supp s1 -> x \in supp s2 -> disj_spec s1 s2 false
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (gets s l)
Variant disj_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V) : bool -> Type := disj_true : (forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \notin supp s2) -> disj_spec s1 s2 true | disj_false : forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \in supp s2 -> disj_spec s1 s2 false Arguments disj_spec [K] [V]%type_scope _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments disj_true [K] [V]%type_scope [s1 s2] _%function_scope Arguments disj_false [K] [V]%type_scope [s1 s2 x]
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (gets i k)) -> getl n (gets (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (gets i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
disj_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V), (forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \notin supp s2) -> disj_spec s1 s2 true
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getl n (gets s lc)) (getl n (gets s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
fmapE : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V), s1 = s2 < -> seq_of s1 = seq_of s2
disjP : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V), disj_spec s1 s2 (disj s1 s2)
supp_fcat : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V), supp (fcat s1 s2) =i [predU supp s1 & supp s2]
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s l)] : world -> Pred state
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
domK : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 g1 g2 : U), valid (f1 \+ g1) -> valid (f2 \+ g2) -> dom (f1 \+ g1) =i dom (f2 \+ g2) -> dom f1 =i dom f2 -> dom g1 =i dom g2
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getl n d = getl n {| dstate := upd m (getl m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
cohD : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> dom w =i dom s
hooks_consistent = fun (c : context) (h : hooks) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc ls : Label) (t : nat_ordType), (z, lc, (ls, t)) \in dom h -> (lc \in dom c) && (ls \in dom c) : context -> hooks -> Prop
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
domUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), dom (f1 \+ f2) =i [pred x | valid (f1 \+ f2) & (x \in dom f1) || (x \in dom f2)]
max_key_last : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> {in dom f, forall y : nat, y <= x} -> last_key f = x
keys_last_mono : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U) (k : K), path oleq k (dom f1) -> path oleq k (dom f2) -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \in dom f2) -> oleq (last k (dom f1)) (last k (dom f2))
dom_last_key : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
last_key_mono : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), {subset dom f1 <= dom f2} -> last_key f1 <= last_key f2
dom_ordfresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x < fresh f
last_key_max : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> x <= last_key f
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)

```coq
intros w this s1 s2 l H1 H2.
unfold dom.
intros H3 H4.
apply (Coh_dom l s1 H3) in H1.
apply (step_preserves_labels s1 s2 H2) in H4.
rewrite H1, H4.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros w this s1 s2 l H1 H2. unfold dom. intros H3 H4. apply (Coh_dom l s1 H3) in H1. apply (step_preserves_labels s1 s2 H2) in H4.
